title: Revert the Kled q buff and address his real issues
body:
Is this the buff he needed? No.  Is this the buff I wanted as a Kled main? No.  Is this change going to hurt the game in the long run?  Absolutely.  Healing in general is out of line yes, but that is due to how easy healing debuffs are to obtain right now.  Adding more healing debuffs to the game will only force you to buff healing even more, otherwise healing won’t be useful.

Revert the q change and consider this instead:

Stats:
Buff Kled’s health to 340 + 75 per level from 340 + 70 per level
Nerf Skaarl’s health to 400 + 60 per level from 400 + 65 per level

Passive:
Courage when hitting enemy champions lowered to 12 from 15

Remove the -20% damage to champions when dismounted

Alternatively

Kled now gains 15% / 40% increased attack speed when dismounted, scaling with level.


There’s also a bug where his enhanced W attack just straight won’t proc.  It happens every game against minions, however, it has rarely happened against champions.  That being said it still does happen, and it should be fixed as soon as possible.

replies.body:
Adding healing debuffs on champions is a good way to go about it. But we need to remove healing debuffs on items for it to mean anything.

Currently it's just unneeded added power, but if healing debuffs on items didn't exist, it would be a necessary niche.

Healing debuffs on items is also why heals are so out of line, because they compete with each other.

TL;DR: Keep healing debuffs on champs, remove healing debuffs from items and nerf out of line healing.

I don’t like the idea of giving champions these kinds of Anti-Mechanic mechanics if that makes sense.  If healing is overpowered, nerf healing across the board.  If shields are overpowered, nerf shields.

Fact is, healing is overtuned because Grievous Wounds on items exists.

Remove GW from items, balance healing, keep GW as a niche champ mechanic.

Or just remove GW entirely.

Simple, It CAN'T be silenced if its automatic. Meaning chogath, soraka, malzahar, garen, kassadin can't stop you mid attack or even prevent it from going off. MAYBE reduce its cooldown instead? Because activation would have positives but also a negative.

Either way, removing the bugs first would be nice...
GLORY TO THE KLED PLAYERS
Does anyone here understand math or play Kled? These are joke buffs, and cutting Kled's courage generation on AAs from 15 to 12 will neuter him.

To be honest, one of the things I find lacking in Kled's kit is that it feels like he only has 2 abilities, and one of them is tied to Autos in a way you can't control. He is meant to be a 1v1 killing machine and a perfect single target picker in teamfights, yet his ult barely has any uses in fights other than having a slight knock-back and his E is just a way to stick to his target without anything else extra (and this, with an huge cooldown for an ability doing barely anything).

His passive is possibly the strongest in the whole game, the only reason it feels so lacking is because how burst damage is sooooooo common in the game and that Assassins are pretty much ruling everything, making remounts hardly possible against opponents who actually know how it works.

My take on balancing him would be putting a new passive effect on his E (since he levels it last, making it more late-game relevant), making him take reduced damage from all sources BUT the person hit by his Q knockback (only if it does hit). While dismounted, it would be the opposite, making him take reduced damage from those hit by his shotgun blast.

What he is lacking is new mechanics, not bigger numbers (he already has some of the biggest in the game). Anti-healing is interesting, but not in such a meta and particularly not on a champ such as Kled, he needs something else to replace this.
